Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data

Class TerrierIndex

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.TerrierIndex
public class TerrierIndex
extends java.lang.Object
Class for generating Terrier indexes and queries from graphs.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Craig Macdonald (craig.macdonald@glasgow.ac.uk), Iadh Ounis (iadh.ounis@glasgow.ac.uk), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

    • query

      public org.terrier.querying.ScoredDocList query​(int uidx, java.lang.String model, java.util.Optional<java.lang.Double> c)
      Executes a query over the collection.
      Parameters:
      uidx - identifier of the "query" user.
      model - identifier of the weighting model.
      c - c value of the weighting model (ex. the b param. in BM25).
      Returns:
      a list of results if everything is OK, null otherwise.
